content: in decrease 1dc in next 2 sts 1fphtr around next 2fphtr next chain-space 9 10 11 times 1fphtr around each of next decrease 1dc in every st to 2 sts before second set of 2fphtr 1dc up 11 12 13 sts evenly along the edge of fpht decrease 1fphtr around next 2fphtr 1dc in next heel flap placing approximately 1 st in every other 2 sts decrease 1dc in next 2 sts decrease 1dc in every row place blue marker in the first st worked st to end 44 48 52 sts on heel flap you are now back at the end of round round 3 1dc in every st and 1fphtr around each fphtr start working in a continuous spiral placing yellow repeat last 2 rnds 4 times more 28 32 36 sts marker to denote the beg of round 58 64 68 sts including chain-sps repeat round 2 another 2 3 4 times more 20 sts move all markers up as you work fasten_off leaving a tail of approximately 15cm round 2 1dc in every st to 2 sts before the red marker decrease 1dc in st with red marker 1fphtr around next making up 2fphtr ch2 miss next st 1dc in next chain-space ch2 9 10 11 times 1fphtr around next 2fphtr 1dc in turn the socks inside out with the tapestry needle st with blue marker decrease 1dc in every st to end use the tail to sew toe opening closedand weave in 56 62 66 sts including chain-sps the ends when you complete your gorgeous socks you may wish to wet block them to do this soak your socks in round 3 1dc in every st to 2 sts before the red marker lukewarm water squeeze out excess moisture and pin 1dc in st with red marker 1fphtr around each of next out to size or place them on sock blockers 2fphtr 1dc in next st ch2 miss next st 1dc in next allow to dry naturally chain-space 9 10 11 times 1fphtr around each of next 2fphtr 1dc in st with blue marker 1dc in every st to end 56 62 66 sts including chain-sps repeat last 2 rnds 4 5 5 more times 48 52 56 sts foot keeping only the yellow marker in place continue as follows round 1 1dc in every st to first set of fphtr 1fphtr around each of next 2fphtr ch2 miss next st 1dc in next chain-space ch2 9 10 11 times 1fphtr around each of next 2fphtr 1dc in every st to end round 2 1dc in every st to first set of fphtr 1fphtr around each of next 2fphtr 1dc in next st ch2 miss next st 1 double_crochet in next chain-space 9 10 11 times 1fphtr around each of next 2fphtr 1dc in every st to end repeat last two rnds of foot until foot measures 17 18 5 20 cm from the back of the heel 5 dfp0029 / wys1000160 5 053682 003161
